page.title: 09BORROWASH QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content: In a recent survey of parents and visitors carried out by pupils of {ASHBROOK JUNIOR SCHOOL}the following facts emerged: 84% of the people interviewed liked living in {BORROWASH with its friendliness being the most frequently quoted reason.The only consistent grievance concerned the lack of leisure facilities in the immediate area particularly for young children and teenagers.Our amenities count seemed to highlight this inadequacy.The village shopping facilities were generally considered adequate although the most popular facilities were those in {NOTTINGHAM} with those of {DERBY}a poor second.The amount of time families had lived in { {BORROWASH}ranged from 2 to 60 years, the average period was 15.7years.69% travelled mainly by car,train travel scored badly as no local station.
